summary: This is an email chain between attorneys regarding the case US v Epstein, specifically concerning a formal preservation/production request for NPA-related materials. It shows legal coordination among defense counsel in July 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Attorney sending a formal preservation/production request for NPA-related materials in the US v Epstein case.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Copied on the email regarding the preservation/production request for NPA-related materials.

persons.name: Michael Miller
persons.context: Recipient of the email and included in the 'To' field regarding the US v Epstein case.

connections.description: Both are attorneys copied on the same email regarding legal strategy in US v Epstein.
Weinberg is sending a formal legal request to Miller regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Preservation/Production Request for NPA Materials
events.description: Attorney Martin G. Weinberg sends a formal request for preservation and production of NPA-related materials in the US v Epstein case.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 26, 2019, concerning the case US v Epstein.
It references a formal preservation/production request for NPA-related materials, indicating ongoing legal discovery or evidence collection.
The correspondence involves attorneys Martin G. Weinberg, Reid Weingarten, and Michael Miller, showing coordination among defense counsel.
The email includes a confidentiality notice from the Law Office of Martin G. Weinberg, P.C., highlighting privileged communication.
